herbs.name: Ginkgo Biloba
herbs.description: Ginkgo Biloba is an ancient tree species known for its fan-shaped leaves. It is commonly used for its potential cognitive benefits, including improved memory and concentration.

herbs.name: Burdock Root
herbs.description: Burdock root is a plant root commonly used in traditional medicine. It is believed to have detoxifying properties and is used for skin conditions and digestive health.

herbs.name: Oregano
herbs.description: Oregano is a fragrant herb often used in cooking. It is known for its antimicrobial properties and is used both culinarily and medicinally.

herbs.name: Mullein
herbs.description: Mullein is a tall plant with fuzzy leaves. It is often used for respiratory conditions and is believed to have soothing and expectorant properties.

herbs.name: Yarrow
herbs.description: Yarrow is a flowering plant with feathery leaves. It is used for its potential anti-inflammatory and wound-healing properties and is often applied topically.

herbs.name: Motherwort
herbs.description: Motherwort is an herb in the mint family. It is traditionally used for its potential calming effects on the nervous system and is believed to support heart health.

herbs.name: Red Clover
herbs.description: Red Clover is a flowering plant used in traditional medicine. It is believed to have estrogen-like effects and is often used for hormonal balance and skin health.

herbs.name: Butterbur
herbs.description: Butterbur is a plant with large leaves. It is traditionally used for migraines and allergies and is believed to have anti-inflammatory properties.

herbs.name: Cayenne Pepper
herbs.description: Cayenne pepper is a hot chili pepper used in cooking. It is known for its spicy flavor and is believed to have potential cardiovascular and metabolic benefits.

herbs.name: Sage
herbs.description: Sage is an aromatic herb often used in cooking. It is known for its potential cognitive and memory-enhancing properties and is used both culinarily and medicinally.

herbs.name: Devil's Claw
herbs.description: Devil's Claw is a plant native to southern Africa. It is traditionally used for its anti-inflammatory properties and is often taken as a supplement for joint health.

herbs.name: Ashwagandha
herbs.description: Ashwagandha is an adaptogenic herb used in Ayurvedic medicine. It is believed to help the body adapt to stress, improve energy levels, and support overall well-being.

herbs.name: Feverfew
herbs.description: Feverfew is a plant with small daisy-like flowers. It is traditionally used for migraines and headaches, and it is believed to have anti-inflammatory properties.

herbs.name: Hawthorn
herbs.description: Hawthorn is a shrub with berries that have been used in traditional medicine for heart health. It is believed to support cardiovascular function and improve circulation.

herbs.name: Bilberry
herbs.description: Bilberry is a small, dark purple fruit similar to blueberries. It is rich in antioxidants and is believed to support eye health and improve vision.

herbs.name: Cat's Claw
herbs.description: Cat's Claw is a woody vine native to the Amazon rainforest. It is believed to have anti-inflammatory properties and is used in traditional medicine for various health benefits.

herbs.name: St. John's Wort
herbs.description: St. John's Wort is an herb with yellow flowers. It is used for its potential antidepressant and mood-stabilizing effects and is often taken as a supplement.

herbs.name: Licorice Root
herbs.description: Licorice root is the root of the licorice plant. It is often used for its sweet flavor and is believed to have anti-inflammatory and soothing properties, especially for the digestive system.

herbs.name: Arnica
herbs.description: Arnica is a flowering plant known for its yellow daisy-like flowers. It is used topically for its potential anti-inflammatory and pain-relieving properties, especially for bruises and muscle soreness.

herbs.name: Ginseng
herbs.description: Ginseng is a root used in traditional medicine. It is believed to have adaptogenic properties, helping the body adapt to stress. Ginseng is also used to enhance energy and cognitive function.
